API documentation¶

ChemPlot has a main class Plotter, to which the list of molecules is passed as a parameter in order to then use different functions for plotting.

Plotter¶

class chemplot.chemplot.Plotter(encoding_list, target, target_type, sim_type, get_desc, get_fingerprints)[source]¶

A class used to plot the ECFP fingerprints of the molecules used to instantiate it.

construct_plot(x, y, size, kind, title, remove_outliers, is_colored, colorbar)[source]¶

Generates a plot for the given molecules embedded in two dimensions.

Parameters

  • df_2_components (Dataframe) – The molecules to plot

  • x (string) – The first column of the dataframe containing the molecules

  • y (string) – The second column of the dataframe containing the molecules

  • size (int) – Size of the plot

  • kind (string) – Type of plot

  • title (string) – Title of the plot

  • remove_outliers (boolean) – Boolean value indicating if the outliers must be identified and removed

  • is_colored (boolean) – Indicates if the points must be colored according to target

Returns

The matplotlib axes containing the plot.

Return type

Axes

classmethod from_inchi(inchi_list, target=[], target_type=None, sim_type=None)[source]¶

Class method to construct a Plotter object from a list of InChi.

Parameters

  • inchi_list (dict) – List of the InChi representation of the molecules to plot.

  • target (dict) – target values

  • target_type (string) – target type R (regression) or C (classificatino)

  • sim_type (string) – similarity type structural or tailored

Returns

A Plotter object for the molecules given as input.

Return type

Plotter

classmethod from_smiles(smiles_list, target=[], target_type=None, sim_type=None)[source]¶

Class method to construct a Plotter object from a list of SMILES.

Parameters

  • smile_list (dict) – List of the SMILES representation of the molecules to plot.

  • target (dict) – target values

  • target_type (string) – target type R (regression) or C (classificatino)

  • sim_type (string) – similarity type structural or tailored

Returns

A Plotter object for the molecules given as input.

Return type

Plotter

pca(kind='scatter', size=20, remove_outliers=False, is_colored=True, colorbar=False)[source]¶

Calculates the first 2 PCA components of ECFP fingerprints and plots the data based on the result.

Parameters

  • kind (string) – Type of plot (default is scatter plot)

  • size (int) – Size of the plot (default size)

  • remove_outliers (boolean) – Boolean value indicating if the outliers must be identified and removed (default False)

Returns

The matplotlib axes containing the plot.

Return type

Axes

tmap()[source]¶

Calculates and plots the TMAP based on ECFP fingerprints.

Returns

plot object

tsne(perplexity=None, random_state=None, pca=False, kind='scatter', size=20, remove_outliers=False, is_colored=True, colorbar=False)[source]¶

Calculates the first 2 t-SNE components of ECFP fingerprints and plots the data based on the result.

Parameters

  • perplexity (int) – perplexity value for the t-SNE model

  • pca_preprocessing_components (int) – Number of components the PCA preprocessing will identify. By default the preprocessing is not used.

  • kind (string) – Type of plot (default is scatter plot)

  • size (int) – Size of the plot (default size)

  • remove_outliers (boolean) – Boolean value indicating if the outliers must be identified and removed (default False)

Returns

The matplotlib axes containing the plot.

Return type

Axes

umap(n_neighbors=None, min_dist=None, random_state=None, kind='scatter', size=20, remove_outliers=False, is_colored=True, colorbar=False)[source]¶

Calculates the first 2 UMAP components of ECFP fingerprints and plots the data based on the result.

Parameters

  • num_neighbors (int) – Number of neighbours used in the UMAP madel.

  • kind (string) – Type of plot (default is scatter plot)

  • size (int) – Size of the plot (default size)

  • remove_outliers (boolean) – Boolean value indicating if the outliers must be identified and removed (default False)

Returns

The matplotlib axes containing the plot.

Return type

Axes
